ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Goblin" <goblin@...>

> So I walk around with my level one Life Tap
>memorized in a spare slot, and just tap everything that people are
fighting.
>(I do an OOC first and occasionally explaining what I am doing, just so
>folks don't think I am kill stealing.) This allows me to hit very high
>numbers of faction very very quickly.


Hello
What I found helpful along this same lines is to cast the lev 1 disease
cloud. 5 mana. On anything I want to get the faction points for. This does
only 5 damage for so, so no chance for a kill steal but it does stop a
monster from healing which has the nice benifit of being a steath DoT that
can help the real group fighting by reducing the total hps of the monster by
quite a bit. For example my pet (lev 16 spell) heals 5-10% of its hps from
just fearing the monster or my tanking DURING the fight. So I'm guessing
monsters can easily heal up 10% of their hps or more in a normal warrior
melee the monster type of fight. So your stoping the healing is a nice
blessing for almost no mana. I have heard of many necro's using this simple
lev 1 spell well into the upper 20's for this effect.

Sincerely,
Mortifer - Humble Knight - MoltenLava

AKA - Eloric - Necromancer Rank 5
- Veneficus - Magician Rank 5
